attributes.action: Cancel all exams including GCSES andA-Levels for 2022. For all the time lost
attributes.additional_details: So that they can get a chance in life as they have missed out a lot of studying time and their work will not be to their best ability.
attributes.background: Cancel all major exams for 2022 including GCSE and A-Levels and replace it with teachers assessments and class work. They have lost a lot of studying time and they will struggle and won’t do their best academically.
